TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit JavaScriptSerializer extends System.Object

summary.span: 应对 [Json.NET](http://www.newtonsoft.com/json) 使用序列化和反序列化。

span.span: [Json.NET](http://www.newtonsoft.com/json) should be used for serialization and deserialization.

summary.span: 为启用 AJAX 的应用程序提供序列化和反序列化功能。

span.span: Provides serialization and deserialization functionality for AJAX-enabled applications.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 类在内部用于通过异步通信层进行序列化和反序列化浏览器和 Web 服务器之间传递数据。The class is used internally by the asynchronous communication layer to serialize and deserialize the data that is passed between the browser and the Web server. 无法访问该实例的序列化程序。You cannot access that instance of the serializer. 但是，此类公开一个公共 API。However, this class exposes a public API. 因此，可以使用类时要在托管代码中使用 JavaScript 对象表示法 (JSON)。Therefore, you can use the class when you want to work with JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) in managed code. 若要将对象序列化，使用方法。To serialize an object, use the method. 若要反序列化的 JSON 字符串，使用或方法。To deserialize a JSON string, use the or methods. 若要进行序列化和反序列化不本机支持的类型，通过使用来实现自定义转换器类。To serialize and deserialize types that are not natively supported by , implement custom converters by using the class. 然后使用注册转换器方法。Then register the converters by using the method. ## 托管的类型与 JSON 之间的映射Mapping Between Managed Types and JSON 下表显示了序列化过程托管的类型与 JSON 之间的映射。The following table shows the mapping between managed types and JSON for the serialization process. 以本机方式支持这些托管的类型。These managed types are natively supported by . 您反序列化时从 JSON 字符串到托管类型，将应用相同的映射。When you are deserializing from a JSON string to a managed type, the same mapping applies. 但是，非对称; 可以是反序列化并非所有可序列化的托管的类型可以将反序列化为 JSON。However, deserialization can be asymmetric; not all serializable managed types can be deserialized from JSON. > [!NOTE] > 多维数组序列化为一维数组，并应将其用作平面数组。A multidimensional array is serialized as a one-dimensional array, and you should use it as a flat array. |托管的类型Managed type|JSON 等效项JSON equivalent| |------------------|---------------------| | (UTF-8 编码仅)。 (UTF-8 encoding only).|StringString| ||StringString| |单一 null 字符 （例如，\0)Single null char (such as, \0 )|nullNull| ||布尔值。Boolean. 在 JSON 中以表示`true`或 `false`Represented in JSON as `true` or `false`| |`null` (`null`的对象引用和值类型)。`null` (`null` object references and value types).|字符串值为 nullA string value of null| ||字符串值为 nullA string value of null| |基元数值 （或数字兼容） 类型： ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和。Primitive numeric (or numeric-compatible) types: , , , , , , , , , and . 使用的区域性不变的字符串表示形式。The culture-invariant string representation is used.|数字Number| ||在 JSON 中以所表示的日期对象"\\日期 （计时周期数）/\\/"。Date object, represented in JSON as "\\/Date(number of ticks)\\/". 计时周期数是正数或负数的长值，该值指示 01 1970 年 1 月，UTC 午夜起经过的计时周期 （毫秒） 数。The number of ticks is a positive or negative long value that indicates the number of ticks (milliseconds) that have elapsed since midnight 01 January, 1970 UTC.

支持的最大值是的日期(12/31/9999 11:59:59 PM) 支持的最小日期值为(0001 年 1 月 1 日上午 12:00:00)。The maximum supported date value is (12/31/9999 11:59:59 PM) and the minimum supported date value is (1/1/0001 12:00:00 AM).| |整数类型的枚举Enumerations of integer type|枚举值的整数等效项Integer equivalent of the enumeration value| |类型实现或，也不实现或。Types that implement or that are not also implementations of or . 这包括类型，如， ，和。This includes types such as , , and .|数组，它使用 JSON 数组语法Array that uses JSON array syntax| |类型实现或。Types that implement or . 这包括类型，如和。This includes types such as and .|使用 JSON 字典语法的 JavaScript 对象JavaScript object that uses JSON dictionary syntax| |自定义具体 （非抽象） 类型，已有的公共实例属性 get 访问器或公共实例字段。Custom concrete (non-abstract) types that have public instance properties that have get accessors or public instance fields.

请注意与标记为公共的只写属性、 公共属性或公共字段特性，且这些类型的公共索引的属性会被忽略。Note that public write-only properties, public property or public field attributes marked with , and public indexed properties in these types are ignored.|使用 JSON 字典语法的 JavaScript 对象。JavaScript object that uses JSON dictionary syntax. 名为"__type"的特殊元数据属性是包括在内，以确保正确反序列化。A special metadata property named "__type" is included to ensure correct deserialization. 请确保公共实例属性具有 get 和 set 访问器以确保正确反序列化。Make sure that public instance properties have get and set accessors to ensure correct deserialization.| ||GUID 的字符串表示形式String representation of a GUID| ||返回值的字符串表示形式 String representation of the return value of | ## Examples 第一个示例提供了如何序列化和反序列化数据对象的简单说明。The first example provides a simple illustration of how to serialize and deserialize data objects. 它需要一个名为如下所示的 Person 类。It requires a class named Person which is shown below. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/cs/default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/vb/default.aspx.vb#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/cs/default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/vb/default.aspx.vb#2)] 下面的示例演示使用的更复杂和完成项目类来保存和还原使用 JSON 序列化的对象的状态。The next example shows a more complicated and complete project that uses the class to save and restore the state of an object by using JSON serialization. 此代码使用为提供的自定义转换器类。This code uses a custom converter that is provided for the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Script.Serialization#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/CS/Default.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Script.Serialization#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/VB/Default.aspx#4)]

summary.span: 初始化不具有类型解析程序的 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that has no type resolver.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例类没有类型解析程序不包括在序列化的 JSON 字符串中的类型元数据属性 （名为"__type"）。An instance of the class without a type resolver does not include type metadata properties (named "__type") in the serialized JSON string. 类型元数据属性由和JSON 字符串转换为类型的方法来确定相应托管。A type metadata property is used by the and methods to determine the appropriate managed type to which the JSON string will be converted. 有关类型解析程序的信息，请参阅类。For information about type resolvers, see the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public JavaScriptSerializer (System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver resolver);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver resolver) cil managed
Public Sub New (resolver As JavaScriptTypeResolver)
public: JavaScriptSerializer(System::Web::Script::Serialization::JavaScriptTypeResolver ^ resolver);
new System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer : System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver -> System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer

param.name: resolver
param.span: 自定义类型解析程序对象。

span.span: The custom type-resolver object.

summary.span: 初始化具有自定义类型解析程序的 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that has a custom type resolver.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它序列化对象时类使用`resolver`参数，以确定要包括在序列化的 JSON 字符串类型的元数据属性 ("__type") 中的相应值。When it is serializing an object, the class uses the `resolver` parameter to determine the appropriate value to include in the serialized JSON string for the type metadata property ("__type"). 同样，当类反序列化的 JSON 字符串，它解析为相应的托管类型通过使用解析程序实例的类型元数据属性值。Similarly, when the class is deserializing a JSON string, it resolves the type metadata property value to the appropriate managed type by using the resolver instance. 可以设置`resolver`参数`null`，这相当于调用构造函数。You can set the `resolver` parameter to `null`, which is equivalent to calling the constructor. 实例调用 Web 服务客户端脚本中的使用特殊类型解析程序所使用的异步通信层。The instance of that is used by the asynchronous communication layer for invoking Web services from client script uses a special type resolver. 此类型解析程序将可反序列化的类型限制为 Web 服务的方法签名或那些具有中定义的那些应用。This type resolver restricts the types that can be deserialized to those defined in the Web service’s method signature, or the ones that have the applied. 不能以编程方式修改该内置类型解析器。You cannot modify this built-in type resolver programmatically. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用与自定义的类型解析器初始化此对象的实例可能会造成安全风险。Using an instance of this object initialized with a custom type-resolver can present a security risk. 此对象只能用于受信任的数据。Use this object only with trusted data. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据验证](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

MemberSignature.Value: public object ConvertToType (object obj, Type targetType);
.method public hidebysig instance object ConvertToType(object obj, class System.Type targetType) cil managed
Public Function ConvertToType (obj As Object, targetType As Type) As Object
public: System::Object ^ ConvertToType(System::Object ^ obj, Type ^ targetType);
member this.ConvertToType : obj * Type -> obj

span.span: The object to convert.
The type to convert the object to.

summary.span: 将指定的对象转换成指定的类型。

span.span: Converts the specified object to the specified type.

returns.span: 序列化的 JSON 字符串。

span.span: The serialized JSON string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当实例序列化一个类型为其注册自定义转换器，序列化程序调用方法以获取将转换为 JSON 格式的字符串的名称/值对的字典。When the instance is serializing a type for which a custom converter is registered, the serializer calls the method to obtain the dictionary of name/value pairs that will be converted to a JSON-formatted string. 方法还会引发异常，如果对象图太过复杂，或已注册的实例导致转换器递归。The method can also throw exceptions if the object graph is too complex, or if registered instances of have caused converter recursion.

exception.span: 所生成的 JSON 格式字符串超出了 的值。

span.span: The resulting JSON-formatted string exceeds the value of .
-or-
contains a circular reference.

exception.span: 循环引用出现在子对象引用父对象，而父对象又引用子对象时。

span.span: A circular reference occurs when a child object has a reference to a parent object, and the parent object has a reference to the child object.

exception.span: 超出了由 定义的递归限制。

span.span: The recursion limit defined by was exceeded.

MemberSignature.Value: public T ConvertToType<T> (object obj);
.method public hidebysig instance !!T ConvertToType<T>(object obj) cil managed
Public Function ConvertToType(Of T) (obj As Object) As T
member this.ConvertToType : obj -> 'T

span.span: The type to which obj will be converted.
The object to convert.

summary.span: 将给定对象转换为指定类型。

span.span: Converts the given object to the specified type.

returns.span: 已转换成目标类型的对象。

span.span: The object that has been converted to the target type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法会尝试将由表示该对象实例转换`obj`类型的实例到`T`。The method tries to convert the object instance that is represented by `obj` to an instance of type `T`. 在此转换过程则维护对象引用相等性不能保证。During this conversion there is no guarantee that object reference equality is maintained. 因此，您不能假设`obj`和`T`引用同一对象。Therefore, you cannot assume that `obj` and `T` refer to the same object. 旨在实现从派生的类时要使用。 is intended to be used if you implement a class that derives from . 转换器代码必须能够获取一个值，在序列化程序将传递给它，字典中，然后将该值转换为类型的实例`T`。Converter code must be able to take a value that is in the dictionary that the serializer passes to it, and then convert that value to an instance of type `T`. 而不是重新实现自定义转换代码来执行此任务，可以调用从转换器代码的方法。Instead of re-implementing the custom conversion code to perform this task, you can call the method from the converter code. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来获取对象从传递给转换器的字典中的值。The following example shows how to use the method to obtain a object from a value in the dictionary that is passed to the converter. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.Serialization#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/CS/App_Code/ListItemCollectionConverter.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.Serialization#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/VB/App_Code/ListItemCollectionConverter.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public T Deserialize<T> (string input);
.method public hidebysig instance !!T Deserialize<T>(string input) cil managed
Public Function Deserialize(Of T) (input As String) As T
member this.Deserialize : string -> 'T

span.span: The type of the resulting object.

param.name: input
param.span: 要进行反序列化的 JSON 字符串。

span.span: The JSON string to be deserialized.

summary.span: 将指定的 JSON 字符串转换为 类型的对象。

span.span: Converts the specified JSON string to an object of type .
The deserialized object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法等效于先使用方法来获取对象图，然后再尝试强制转换结果，以便键入`T`。The method is equivalent to first using the method to obtain an object graph and then trying to cast the result to type `T`. 在反序列化期间序列化程序的当前类型解析程序引用，则用于确定转换都放在数组和字典类型的元素时要使用的托管的类型。During deserialization, the serializer’s current type resolver is referenced, which determines the managed type to use when converting elements that are nested inside arrays and dictionary types. 因此，反序列化过程，循环访问的所有嵌套元素`input`。As a result, the deserialization process iterates through all nested elements of `input`. 有关类型解析程序的详细信息，请参阅类。For more information about type resolvers, see the class. ## Examples 下面的示例提供了如何序列化和反序列化数据对象的简单说明。The following example provides a simple illustration of how to serialize and deserialize data objects. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/cs/default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/vb/default.aspx.vb#1)] 它需要一个名为类`Person`，下面的示例所示。It requires a class named `Person`, which is shown in the following example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/cs/default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/vb/default.aspx.vb#2)]

exception.span: 包含指示自定义类型的“__type”属性，但是反序列化相应 JSON 字符串的结果无法分配给所需的目标类型。

span.span: contains a "__type" property that indicates a custom type, but the result of deserializing the corresponding JSON string cannot be assigned to the expected target type.
-or-

exception.span: 包含指示 或不可实例化的类型（例如，抽象类型或接口）的“__type”属性。

span.span: contains a "__type" property that indicates either or a non-instantiable type (for example, an abstract type or an interface).
-or-

exception.span: 尝试将 JSON 数组转换为类似数组的托管类型，该类型不可用作 JSON 反序列化目标。

span.span: An attempt was made to convert a JSON array to an array-like managed type that is not supported for use as a JSON deserialization target.
-or-

exception.span: 不能将 转换为目标类型。

span.span: It is not possible to convert to the target type.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置 类接受的 JSON 字符串的最大长度。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum length of JSON strings that are accepted by the class.

value.span: JSON 字符串的最大长度。

span.span: The maximum length of JSON strings.

value.span: 默认值为 2097152 个字符，等效于 4 MB 的 Unicode 字符串数据。

span.span: The default is 2097152 characters, which is equivalent to 4 MB of Unicode string data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性适用于仅当显式创建的实例时才类。The value of the property applies only when you explicitly create an instance of the class. 使用`jsonSerialization`元素的配置文件设置的异步通信层使用的内部序列化程序实例的最大长度。Use the `jsonSerialization` element of the configuration file to set the maximum length for the internal serializer instance that is used by the asynchronous communication layer. 有关序列化的配置元素的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 配置 Microsoft Ajax 中的 ASP.NET 服务](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ea4fb56e-bc1d-405a-9877-00cf5e552a30)。For more information about the configuration elements for serialization, see [How to: Configure ASP.NET Services in Microsoft Ajax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ea4fb56e-bc1d-405a-9877-00cf5e552a30).

exception.span: 该属性设置为小于 1 的值。

span.span: The property is set to a value that is less than one.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置用于约束要处理的对象级别的数量的限制。

span.span: Gets or sets the limit for constraining the number of object levels to process.
The number of object levels.
The default is 100.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性引用的对象层次结构中的级别数的将处理在以下情况下：The property refers to the number of levels in the object hierarchy that will process in the following cases: - 当类反序列化的 JSON 字符串。When the class is deserializing a JSON string. - 当类序列化期间遍历对象图。When the class is walking an object graph during serialization. 值仅当显式创建的实例时才适用类。The value of applies only when you explicitly create an instance of the class. 使用`jsonSerialization`元素的配置文件以设置对象级别来处理异步通信层使用的内部序列化程序实例的数量。Use the `jsonSerialization` element of the configuration file to set the number of object levels to process for the internal serializer instance that is used by the asynchronous communication layer. 有关序列化的配置元素的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 配置 Microsoft Ajax 中的 ASP.NET 服务](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ea4fb56e-bc1d-405a-9877-00cf5e552a30)。For more information about the configuration elements for serialization, see [How to: Configure ASP.NET Services in Microsoft Ajax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ea4fb56e-bc1d-405a-9877-00cf5e552a30).

exception.span: 该属性设置为小于 1 的值。

span.span: The property is set to a value that is less than one.

member this.RegisterConverters : seq<System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter> -> unit

param.name: converters
param.span: 包含要注册的自定义转换器的数组。

span.span: An array that contains the custom converters to be registered.

summary.span: 使用 实例注册自定义转换器。

span.span: Registers a custom converter with the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以注册使用的一个或多个自定义转换器实例使用方法。You can register one or more custom converters with a instance by using the method. 注册自定义转换器，使用托管的类型进行序列化和反序列化 JSON 字符串转换为托管类型转换器。When custom converters are registered, uses the converters both to serialize managed types and to deserialize JSON strings to managed types. 有多个转换器可注册具有相同实例，并且这些转换器可以指示对相同类型的支持。Multiple converters can be registered with the same instance, and these converters can indicate support for the same type. 因此，为特定类型注册的最后一个转换器是指将由类型进行序列化。As a result, the last converter that is registered for a specific type is the one that will be used by to serialize the type. 有关自定义转换器的详细信息，请参阅类。For more information about custom converters, see the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何注册自定义转换器，且有实例。The following example shows how to register a custom converter with a instance. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.Serialization#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.Serialization#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/VB/Default.aspx#1)]

span.span: is .

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: The object to serialize.

summary.span: 将对象转换为 JSON 字符串。

span.span: Converts an object to a JSON string.

returns.span: 序列化的 JSON 字符串。

span.span: The serialized JSON string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当实例序列化一个类型为其注册自定义转换器，序列化程序调用方法以获取将转换为 JSON 字符串的名称/值对的字典。When the instance is serializing a type for which a custom converter is registered, the serializer calls the method to obtain the dictionary of name/value pairs that will be converted to a JSON string. 方法还会引发异常，如果对象图太过复杂，或已注册的实例导致转换器递归。The method can also throw exceptions if the object graph is too complex, or if registered instances of have caused converter recursion. ## Examples 下面的示例提供了如何序列化和反序列化数据对象的简单说明。The following example provides a simple illustration of how to serialize and deserialize data objects. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/cs/default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/vb/default.aspx.vb#1)] 它需要一个名为类`Person`，下面的示例所示。It requires a class named `Person`, which is shown in the following example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/cs/default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/vb/default.aspx.vb#2)]

span.span: The resulting JSON string exceeds the value of .
-or-
contains a circular reference.

exception.span: 循环引用出现在子对象引用父对象，而父对象又引用子对象时。

span.span: A circular reference occurs when a child object has a reference to a parent object, and the parent object has a reference to the child object.

exception.span: 超出了由 定义的递归限制。

span.span: The recursion limit defined by was exceeded.
